name: sce_replace_gas_boiler_with_electric_boiler
display_name: SCE Replace Gas Boiler with Electric Boiler
description: Replace existing gas or fuel boiler with electric boiler.
modeler_description: Replaces existing fossil-fuel hydronic heating source with electric resistance boiler with user-input efficiency. Replacement boiler will be controlled to the same leaving water temperature as the exisiting boiler, and auto-sized to meet the building load. If exisiting HVAC is not hydronic, the measure will do nothing.
